LatestNews.Content: Coach Dennis Allen said Derek Hagan will start Sunday's game against the Saints if Darrius Heyward-Bey (hamstring) is inactive.

LatestNews.Title: Derek Hagan to start if Heyward-Bey can't go

LatestNews.Content: Coach Chan Gailey indicated that WR Derek Hagan is "working his tail off" and "pushing hard to be a big part of this offense."
